channel.title: Stock Rally on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Stock Rally on FinanClub

item.title: TSM
item.description: score:20 Chances: Rally in Taiwan stocks is attracting retail investors to pile into ETFs. Record stock rally of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. continues despite geopolitical concerns. TSMC is considering building advanced packaging capacity in Japan, adding momentum to Japan’s semiconductor industry. AI technology could be a game-changer for companies across various industries.

item.title: VFS
item.description: score:71 Chances: VinFast is taking advantage of IRA funding and infrastructure bill opportunities to expand in the US and North America. The company’s participation in CES 2024 indicates its commitment to showcasing new EV concepts and models, signaling potential growth in the electric vehicle market.
